thread.section_title: Luna Bazaar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luna Bazaar | www.lunabazaar.com
thread.title: AlpineLass, Alpine, CA
thread.title_full: Luna Bazaar reviewed by AlpineLass, Alpine, CA

author: AlpineLass, Alpine, CA
title: AlpineLass, Alpine, CA
text: My first experience with Luna Bazaar was a great one. I found exactly what I was looking for (small, red glass heart ornaments to hang on a pre-lit birch tree to turn it from a Christmas decoration into a Valentine tree)--they had a better price than the mighty online retailer "A." Lovingly packed and quickly delivered, I will definitely be ordering from them again in the future!
